headline: Lowe’s (LOW) Holds Steady While Home Depot Stumbles, Stifel Says
summary: Lowe’s Companies, Inc. (NYSE:LOW) is included among the 15 Blue Chip Dividend Stocks to Build a Passive Income Porfolio. On December 1, Stifel raised its price target on Lowe’s Companies, Inc. (NYSE:LOW) from $230 to $250, while maintaining a Hold rating on the stock. The update came after the firm revised its estimates following the […]
